outputs.output_descr:
This project aims at enhancing capacities of the PA to mainstream and address the challenges of climate
change in the areas of  mitigation and adaptation.Throughout the project, the first national
communication report on climate change including inventory on green house gases will be prepared and
the capacity of the PA institutions will be assessed and enhanced to mainstream
climate change in respective development plans.

project_descr: Low carbon development and climate change resilient Programme in occupied Palestinian Territory
project_title: Low carbon development and climate change resilient Prog
